name: Available Works
description: The following is where you can purchase works available in Nesbit Salon at the following address; 2311 W Main St Richmond, VA 23831 All works listed here are not available for shipping (excluding stretched canvas prints) and must be picked up from Nesbit Salon. If you know the name of the work you wish to purchase, you may do so below finding it in the scroll bar below and securely checking out. If you have questions or are unsure about the name of a particular piece you wish to purchase, you may contact me directly through the Contact page.

name:
Hood Study #1
Canvas Print
12" x 12"
description: Hood Study #1 is the first in a series of hooded subjects, more specifically, how the hooded sweatshirt is used as a security barrier from the subject's environment. The original was drawn using graphite & charcoal on drawing paper and these materials translate to the canvas beautifully. This is an open-edition fine art giclee print on stretched canvas. Each print is museum stretched with the corners tightly under-tucked to hide any seams on the top and bottom, leaving the sides flat. The image is printed using Epson Ultrachrome Inks at the highest resolution (1440 dpi) and then sprayed with a UV protective coating to prevent fading. - 12" x 12" - Ready to hang - Hanging hardware included - Sturdy 1.5" stretched bars - Museum quality print - Archival Follow on Facebook Follow on Instagram

name:
Hair Study #11
Canvas Print
11" x 14"
description: Hair Study #11 is the focal point of one of my paintings titled 'Egress'. I was drawn to this subject because of the wrinkles in her back suggest a slight twist in her shoulders, allowing her body language to become a tell in my painting. The original was drawn using graphite & charcoal on drawing paper and these materials translate to the canvas beautifully. This is an open-edition fine art giclee print on stretched canvas. Each print is museum stretched with the corners tightly under-tucked to hide any seams on the top and bottom, leaving the sides flat. The image is printed using Epson Ultrachrome Inks at the highest resolution (1440 dpi) and then sprayed with a UV protective coating to prevent fading. - 11" x 14" - Ready to hang - Hanging hardware included - Sturdy 1.5" stretched bars - Museum quality print - Archival Follow on Facebook Follow on Instagram

name:
Hair Study #8
Canvas Print
12" x 12"
description: Hair Study #8 is but one of a few hair studies that involve a face, in this case a profile of a young lady wearing a top with geometric accents. The original was drawn using graphite & charcoal on drawing paper and these materials translate to the canvas beautifully. This is an open-edition fine art giclee print on stretched canvas. Each print is museum stretched with the corners tightly under-tucked to hide any seams on the top and bottom, leaving the sides flat. name:
Hair Study #10
Canvas Print
11" x 14"
description: Hair Study #10 is based on a more traditional portrait scenario. In this piece I was playing with the lines of her hair being carried by the neck muscles and slope of her shoulder. The original was drawn using graphite & charcoal on drawing paper and these materials translate to the canvas beautifully. This is an open-edition fine art giclee print on stretched canvas. Each print is museum stretched with the corners tightly under-tucked to hide any seams on the top and bottom, leaving the sides flat. The image is printed using Epson Ultrachrome Inks at the highest resolution (1440 dpi) and then sprayed with a UV protective coating to prevent fading. - 11" x 14" - Ready to hang - Hanging hardware included - Sturdy 1.5" stretched bars - Museum quality print - Archival Follow on Facebook Follow on Instagram
